Native American Home Ownership Opportunity Act of 2007
Native American Home Ownership Opportunity Act of 2007
To reauthorize the program of the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development for loan guarantees for Indian housing.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Financial Services. H. Rept. 110-102.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 62.

action.text: Mr. Boren moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 1676.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

action.text: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs. Reported by Senator Dodd without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 152.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

term.name: Department of Housing and Urban Development

bill.summary: 6/18/2007--Public Law. Native American Home Ownership Opportunity Act of 2007 - Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1992 to extend through FY2012: (1) the authorization of appropriations to the Indian Housing Loan Guarantee Fund for loan guarantees for Native American housing; and (2) the limitation on the outstanding aggregate principal amount of such loans.
